sect1.title: ROWS(LEFT) ROWS(LEFT) and ROWS(RIGHT) ROWS(RIGHT)
sect1.para: The ROWS(LEFT) and ROWS(RIGHT) keywords indicate the parameter being passed to the TRANSFORM function is a record set. These are used in functions where a dataset is being passed, such as COMBINE, ROLLUP, JOIN, DENORMALIZE, and LOOP.
See Also: TRANSFORM Structure, COMBINE, ROLLUP , JOIN, DENORMALIZE, LOOP
